description: Get the list of 5 items under IOT Albase Sheet corresponding to P item under IOT Primary Sheet

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Request for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Request for all requests.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to use. Visit the multiple api token page for more info.

parameters.name: alarm_id
parameters.description: Request's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for all requests.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, then use base 64 encode then partner_key, MD5, finally add "+/" in end.

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if its error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if its error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: warning
response_fields.description: Indicate wrong details if hit warning. Empty if no warning happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: model_mapping_id
response_fields.description: If not 0 then dont not exist. Give the model_mapping_id list not not allowed

response_fields.name: pmside_id
response_fields.description: ID of model list for P item

response_fields.name: alside_id
response_fields.description: ID of model list for A item
